name: SchedulerTimeIntervalConvertible
desc: A protocol that provides a scheduler with an expression for relative time.

items.name: static func microseconds(Int) -> Self
items.desc: Converts the specified number of microseconds into an instance of this scheduler time type.

items.name: static func milliseconds(Int) -> Self
items.desc: Converts the specified number of milliseconds into an instance of this scheduler time type.

items.name: static func nanoseconds(Int) -> Self
items.desc: Converts the specified number of nanoseconds into an instance of this scheduler time type.

items.name: static func seconds(Double) -> Self
items.desc: Converts the specified number of seconds, as a floating-point value, into an instance of this scheduler time type.

items.name: static func seconds(Int) -> Self
items.desc: Converts the specified number of seconds into an instance of this scheduler time type.
